title: Asking about a long train trip
context: Ask how many hours it will take for the train to reach the final city.

content.bestLine: How many hours to the final city?

dialogs.description: Asking a train conductor about travel time

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Excuse me, how many hours to the final city?

lines.speaker: Conductor
lines.text: It's about 10 hours, depending on the route and any potential delays.
